name: Salmon Race
description:
Join the little salmon on his adventurous journey to the wide, open sea. Along the way, you will pass many of Mother Nature’s obstacles. Leap over rocks, avoid tree trunks and grow with your challenges.

To avoid ending up being a bear’s dinner, you’ll have to swim for your life with the little salmon, passing many dangerous obstacles in the water. Your adventure starts in a narrow brook, which flows into the wide, open sea and to freedom at the end of your journey.

★ Swim upstream and leap over rapids
★ Avoid rocks and tree trunks
★ Pass through several stages of development and become a fully grown salmon


Embark on an adventurous journey through nature with your new friend, the salmon!

Support
